# Test Vault

This is a basic test vault for Obsidian plugin testing.

## Structure

- [[Daily Notes]] - Daily note taking
- [[Projects]] - Project management
- [[Templates]] - Note templates
- [[Archive]] - Archived content

#test-vault #readme

# January 1, 2023

## Today's Focus
- Start new testing framework
- Review project goals

## Notes
Beginning work on a comprehensive testing toolkit for Obsidian plugins.

## Tasks
- [x] Set up basic vault structure
- [ ] Create sample content
- [ ] Test framework initialization

## Reflections
Good start to the new year with focused development work.

#daily-note #2023/01/01

# January 2, 2023

## Today's Focus
- Continue framework development
- Write documentation

## Notes
Making good progress on the mock implementations.

- [x] Add MockWorkspace functionality

## Links
- [[2023-01-01]] - Previous day

#daily-note #2023/01/02

# Testing Framework Project

## Overview
Developing a comprehensive testing toolkit for Obsidian plugins.

## Goals
- ‚úÖ Create mock implementations of Obsidian APIs
- ‚úÖ Build test runners for different test types
- üîÑ Develop utilities for common testing scenarios
- ‚è≥ Write comprehensive documentation
- ‚è≥ Create example usage patterns

## Architecture
```
testing-toolkit/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ core/           # Core mock implementations
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils/          # Testing utilities
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ runners/        # Test execution runners
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ fixtures/       # Sample data and fixtures
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ docs/           # Documentation
```

## Timeline
- **Week 1**: Core implementations
- **Week 2**: Test runners and utilities
- **Week 3**: Documentation and examples
- **Week 4**: Testing and refinement

## Related
- [[Daily Notes/2023-01-01]] - Project kickoff
- [[Templates/Project Template]] - Template used

#project #testing #obsidian #active

# Plugin Documentation Project

## Overview
Comprehensive documentation for Obsidian plugin development.

## Goals
- üìù Document all major APIs
- üß™ Create testing examples
- üìñ Write best practices guide
- üîó Link to official documentation

## Status
**Current Phase**: Research and Planning

## Next Steps
1. Review existing documentation
2. Identify gaps and opportunities
3. Create documentation outline
4. Begin writing

## Resources
- [Obsidian Plugin Developer Docs](https://docs.obsidian.md/Plugins/Getting+started/Build+a+plugin)
- [Community Examples](https://github.com/obsidianmd/obsidian-sample-plugin)

#project #documentation #planning

files.content:
# Old Project

## Overview
This was a previous project that has been completed and archived.

## Results
- ‚úÖ All goals achieved
- ‚úÖ Documentation completed
- ‚úÖ Code shipped to production

## Lessons Learned
- Early testing saves time later
- Documentation is crucial for maintenance
- Regular check-ins improve team coordination

## Final Notes
Project successfully completed on schedule and within budget.

#project #completed #archived
